section.p: You find the remains of the snake demon that you slew here. Its rotting flesh adds to the stench of decay that permeates the tomb.
At the far end of the hall, you find a large plaque which is inscribed: ‘Here lies Xinoc the Priest-King, exalted under heaven.’ There is a small hole in the plaque.

If you have an obsidian key, .
If not, there is nothing you can do but leave.

choices.choice: Visit the Vault of the Shadar
